title: National Mall and Memorial Parks: Sustainable Projects
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Environmental Factors     Sustainable Projects                Sustainable Projects       Capital improvement projects at the park, including rehabilitations as well as new memorials, result in construction zones. NPS design and construction projects follow guiding principles for sustainable development at federal facilities, including use of energy efficient lighting, natural light, best management practices for erosion and sedimentation control, and stormwater design that captures most or all rainwater to keep nutrients and sediments from entering the Potomac River and Chesapeake Bay.
